name: LPR (Stop and Go)
description:
SecurOS Auto - Vehicle License Plate Number Recognition - Stop & Go (per camera)
For applications where vehicles come to a full stop.

name: LPR (Low Speed)
description:
SecurOS Auto - Vehicle License Plate Number Recognition - Low Speed (per camera)
Up to 25 mph (40 km/h).

name: LPR (High Speed)
description:
SecurOS Auto - Vehicle License Plate Number Recognition - High Speed (per camera)
Up to 155 mph (250 km/h).

name: LPR (Low Speed) Make/  Model / Color
description:
SecurOS Auto - Vehicle License Plate Number Recognition - Class / Color / Make / Model Add-on (per camera)
** Cannot be purchased without a IF-LPR-SG , IF-LPR-L, or IF-LPR-H license.

name: LPR (High Speed) Make/  Model / Color
description:
SecurOS Auto - Vehicle License Plate Number Recognition - Class / Color / Make / Model Add-on (per camera)
** Cannot be purchased without a IF-LPR-SG , IF-LPR-L, or IF-LPR-H license.

description:
SecurOS NN Occupancy Counter Module (per camera)

name: Person Down Detector
description:
SecurOS NN Man Down Detection Module (per camera)
ISS Neural Network based video analytic for detecting people falling down on the ground.
